roleset.name: advertise, offer for sale

example.name: the one example
example.text: ``The name Classic Coke has tremendous value, and they haven't merchandised that name before,'' says Jesse Meyers, publisher of the trade journal Beverage Digest.

roleset.note: MERCHANDISE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'merchandise' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from merchandise.01-v predicate notes)
